title: Google Authenticator
extract: Google Authenticator is a software token that implements two-step verification services using the Time-based One-time Password Algorithm (TOTP) and HMAC-based One-time Password algorithm (HOTP), for authenticating users of mobile applications by Google.[
extract_html: Google Authenticator is a software token that implements two-step verification services using the Time-based One-time Password Algorithm (TOTP) and HMAC-based One-time Password algorithm (HOTP), for authenticating users of mobile applications by Google.[
